pages.title: Pocked Upgrade Template
pages.text: This is used to upgrade a diamond pickaxe to the "Pocked" level.$(br2) This is made from Spouting "Liquid Yellow Dragon Essence" onto a "Netherite Upgrade Template".
This pickaxe is required to mine the "Blazing Crystal Ore".
Can only be mined with a "Pocked Pickaxe" or higher.
Made from compacting "Blazing Crystal Dust", "Clay Balls", and "Lava".

pages.title: Pocked Essence
pages.text: Obtained from killing the "Exospherical Shard of the Dragon".

pages.title: Liquid Yellow Essence
pages.text: Obtained from draining a "Pocked Dragon Essence" item.
Obtained from a Sequenced Assembly starting with "Charged Heated Crystal Brick", and adding to it "Heated Crystal", and "Liquid Yellow Dragon Essence".
